name: I've owned several iPads over the years, but now they're mostly used by the kids. iOS and the iPad form factor never clicked for me for every day work. However, the 10.5 inch iPad Pro has my interest piqued, especially with iOS 11's enhancements for productivity.

content.html: I've owned several iPads over the years, but now they're mostly used by the kids. iOS and the iPad form factor never clicked for me for every day work. However, the 10.5 inch iPad Pro has my interest piqued, especially with iOS 11's enhancements for productivity.
content.value: I've owned several iPads over the years, but now they're mostly used by the kids. iOS and the iPad form factor never clicked for me for every day work. However, the 10.5 inch iPad Pro has my interest piqued, especially with iOS 11's enhancements for productivity.

summary: It's a device is desperately WANT to fit into my workflow, but it hasn't clicked for me, either. It feels like it has so much promise.

summary: same here. Its tough to justify $1,000+ second computer, when my MacBook Pro is so good. (cleverdevil.io/s/iFVSb)
